sourcesContent:
About Me

Hi there! I'm Gautam, a passionate Software Engineer. I specialize in developing modern web applications using Angular, SpringBoot. With over 2 years of experience in the field, I have a strong foundation in front-end development and a keen eye for user experience.

My journey into the world of programming began during my college days, where I discovered my love for coding and problem-solving. Since then, I've been on a continuous learning journey, exploring new technologies and refining my skills.

When I'm not coding, you can find me singing my favorite songs, experimenting with new softwares, or catching up on the latest tech trends.
